mods.abstract: Correspondence relating to naval supplies such as paint, rope and wire. Correspondents include Political Agent, Bahrain; Messrs Gray Mackenzie and Co. Bahrain; Port Officer, Margil, Basrah [Basra]; Base Supply Officer, Bahrain.
